content:
I notice that we successfully placed the chest but the mining drill is still showing NO_FUEL status despite our attempts to add fuel. Let's try a more focused approach on getting the drill working:

```python
# First let's identify the specific drill we want to work with
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]
print(f"Found drill at position: {drill.position}")
print(f"Initial drill status: {drill.status}")

# Check our coal supply
inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Current inventory: {inventory}")

# Add fuel to the drill
if drill.status == EntityStatus.NO_FUEL:
    # Move close to the drill first
    move_to(Position(x=drill.position.x, y=drill.position.y))
    print("Moved to drill position")
    
    # Try to add more coal
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=10)
    print("Added coal to drill")
    
    # Verify the fuel was added
    print(f"Drill fuel status after adding coal: {drill.fuel}")
    print(f"Updated drill status: {drill.status}")

# Check if there's iron ore nearby for the drill to mine
iron_ore = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
if iron_ore:
    print(f"Found iron ore at: {iron_ore}")
    distance = abs(drill.position.x - iron_ore.x) + abs(drill.position.y - iron_ore.y)
    print(f"Distance from drill to iron ore: {distance}")

Would you like me to execute this code to diagnose the drill issue?
